citations.narrative:
Two rabbit enclosures, housing two rabbits each, had an excessive amount of urine build-up. One of the enclosures also
had an excessive amount of fecal build-up. Inadequate husbandry practices can lead to animal disease. All primary
enclosures shall be kept reasonably free of excreta, hair, cobwebs, and other debris by periodic cleaning.
To be corrected by 05-16-2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
Two rabbit enclosures, housing two rabbits each, had an excessive amount of urine build-up. One of the enclosures also 
had an excessive amount of fecal build-up. Inadequate husbandry practices can lead to animal disease. All primary 
enclosures shall be kept reasonably free of excreta, hair, cobwebs, and other debris by periodic cleaning. 
To be corrected by 05-16-2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
End Section
